summary: A sexy char preset for "Fair Skin Complexion and "Adorable Face"
descriptionHtml:
[u][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=5]Lerona sexy char preset[/size][/b]

[/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4][b]Description[/b][/size][/font]

[/u][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]Lerona sexy char preset is (who thaught it) a savegame, starting in Helgen (i wanted to save you from this long boring execution scene)
[/size]
[/font][img]http://www.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/201505260002cf9d2w5hr0.jpg[/img]


[font=Comic Sans MS][size=4][u]Installation[/u][/size][/font]

[size=3][font=Comic Sans MS]-You need to install this Mod manualy[/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS]-Put the file in your saves folder ([/font][/size][size=3]C:\Users\Username\Documents\My Games\Skyrim\Saves)[/size]
[size=3][font=Comic Sans MS]-don't forget to install [/font][font=Georgia][b]1.UNP
[/b][/font][/size][font=Georgia][size=3][b]                                           2.Fair Skin Complexion

[/b][/size][/font]
author: YourLittleGoat
